job.title: Remote Machine Learning Engineer
job.industry: Financial Services,Information Technology and Services,Market Research
job.description: <p>Our client,&nbsp;<strong>a well-known global information services company</strong>,&nbsp;is actively looking for a&nbsp;<strong>Remote Machine Learning Engineer</strong>&nbsp;to join their team based out of&nbsp;Costa Mesa, CA!&nbsp;*<em>This role will be 100% remote*</em></p><p><br></p><p><strong>*This is an 8 month W2 contract with benefits!*</strong></p><p><br></p><p>You will be working closely with the data science and engineering teams to <strong>provide insights for their US Retail and Online Markets.</strong> They are looking for someone who is naturally curious in <strong>both technical and US business domains.</strong></p><p><br></p><p><strong><u>Responsibilities:</u></strong></p><ul><li><strong>Analyze structured and unstructured data sources to determine the key business questions and hypotheses that can be explored with the data sets</strong></li><li>Evaluate approaches and algorithms based on available data and research objectives</li><li>Develop experimental ML models to solve complex data mining problems</li></ul><p><br></p><p><strong><u>Desired Skills</u></strong></p><ul><li><strong>Bachelor's degree</strong></li><li>3+ years of experience</li><li><strong>Knowledge of SQL, Snowflake, Pyspark, and AWS Sagemaker</strong></li></ul>
